availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Alfred C. Tanner (Clerk of the County Court of McLean county)

body.p: McLean County, Kentucky, lawyer. Kentucky native. Married to S. Mizella. Father of Andrew R. Tanner and Belle Tanner. Served as Clerk for County and Circuit Courts.

bibl.p: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, McLean County, Calhoun, p. 3. H. Charles Ulman, Lawyers' Record and Official Register of the United States (New York: A. S. Barnes & Co., Publishers, 1872), 532. Find A Grave, "Alfred C. Tanner (1826-1890)," Memorial #127202728, https://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=127202728&ref=acom (accessed September, 13, 2017).
Acts of the General Assembly of the Commonwealth of Kentucky (Frankfort: Jno. B. Major, 1861) 239;
